name: B0Bos
description:
B0B is a very dumb AI, but he is your only way to defeat the computer virus. B0B is more of a Artificial Unintelligence than a AI. 

B0B also follows you around until there is a Computer Virus at hand.

Notes:

B0B may get stuck on some of the walls due to him not being very smart.

The viruses may also get stuck on the wall due to them not having a proper path finding mechanic.

The Wowie Game Jam 4.0 was my first game jam so doing this was a lot of fun.
